title: Dripperz
description:

title: Pangolin Exchange
description: Cross chain implementation for the decentralized exchange. Airdrop feature implementation. APIs implementation. UI maintenance. UI integration. Creation of multiple components. Wormhole bridge/ Axelar bridge implementation.

title: Farandole
description: In charge of the website responsivity. Integrated differents wallets. Implemented multiple web3 calls for the application. UI components creation and integration.

title: Hyro - Hackaton project
description: This unfinished project was a very ambitious project for the Ethcc hackathon 2022. Most of the web3 calls have been deactivated since the project in on hold at the moment.
